description:
Nami and Robin look back on Law and Kid’s battle against Big Mom, one of the Four Emperors of the Sea. They explain how the two captains suffered, were driven to the wall, and fought back against the mighty Big Mom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Gekisen Tokushuu! Hangeki Doumei vs Big Mom
Recapping Fierce Fights! The Countercharge Alliance vs. Big Mom
Retour sur un combat épique. L`alliance rebelle contre Big Mom !
Rückblick auf einen stürmischen Kampf! – Die Konterallianz vs. Big Mom
大激戦特集! 反撃同盟VSビッグ・マム
